rukus.text: 33|69|He imandarasakala! Muchaka yisakale kasta diche tomaloke sihamtara darae naha'ba, eteke sihamte yi ratana karaichila allahe te'omka tara paraa nirdosa pramanita karaichila; arau te'om achila allahara ocarata maryadabana.
33|70|He imandarasakala! Tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau sathika katha koraa

33|71|ene karaile te'om tomalokara babe tomalokara amalasamuha sansodhana karaiba arau tomalokara papasamuha ksama karaiba. Yi byakti allaha arau te'omra raachulara anugatya karae, si arasye maha saphalata arjana karaile.

33|72|Niscaya ami akasasamuha, prthirai arau parbatamalara prati'o e'i amanatara prastara dichilo kintu sihamte e'ito (dayitbabhara) bahana karaibalai asbikara karaile arau seya laâ€™balai bhaya karaile arau manuhe seya bahana karaile; niscaya si atyanta yalima, ati ajna.

33|73|Yate allahe munaphika purausa arau munaphika narai lagate musbaraika purausa arau musbaraika naraika sasti diye arau mumina purausa arau mumina naraika ksama karae. Allaha atyanta ksamasila, parama dayalu.
